Judul: DESIGN AND ANALYSIS IN IMPLEMENTATION OF NEUTRAL POINT CLAMPED INVERTER USING SPACE VECTOR PULSE WIDTH MODULATION
Abstrak:
This paper will show you the implementation of  
 

Neutral Point Clamped Inverter in Space Vector PWM  
 

technique for three level inverter. The rated components  
 

that will be used in NPC is presented. The simulation and  
 

hardware implementation has been done for Space Vector  
 

PWM to verified the compatible of NPC in three-level  
 

inverter. Furthermore, the research will be focused in  
 

determining rated voltage, power and current of each  
 

component. Also the control circuit that used in this  
 

inverter will be described briefly.
